summary: Makes lockpicks on all difficulties break at the same rate.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that I initially made for myself - decided to release publicly.
This simple mod edits lockpick health across all lockpicking difficulties so they break at the same rate. There are five .esp files to choose from - enable ONE only.

Recommended to use this along with mods that increase lockpicking difficulty.

Compatibility:
Compatible with anything that doesn't modify lockpick health values.

Requires the latest Skyrim update.
author: Ahaut
